name: Stor:Age
description:
You need to free up some space on your phone by deleting photos, of course going through your photos brings up some old memories. Then you get a fateful text message.

Stor:Age was made for Ludum Dare 42 by TEAM RETROSPECT in the RabidRetrospectGames Discord server. Some friends showed up and threw the game together in 72 hours.

The theme was "running out of space".

Play Instructions

The Mouse (Left Button) can be used to interact with the phone.

Space-bar will advance story content.
